about_the_game:
Y Press Games art books are more than just all the beautiful art from the game. Creator Yaoimila takes readers down the Vampire Slave rabbit hole, sharing loads of insider details. After that is in-depth advise to would-be visual novel developers. Since this has become such a popular feature of past art books, Yaoimila has loaded this 62 page art book with a great deal of game developer wisdom. This one is not to be missed!
  • Nearly All the Stunning CGs from the Vampire Slave Visual Novel
  • Sketch Art from CGs and Character Sprites
  • The Evolution of Vampire Slave from Novel to Visual Novel
  • Tips and Tricks on Becoming a Visual Novel Game Developer
  • How to Keep Your Artist From Burning Out
  • How to Research the Best Genres to Make Visual Novels For
  • Advice on Crowdfunding Your Own Visual Novel
And much more!

content_descriptors.notes: Illustrations that imply sexual conduct.  Blood and torture.

Since this has become such a popular feature of past art books, Yaoimila has loaded this 62 page art book with a great deal of game developer wisdom. This one is not to be missed!

fullgame.name: Vampire Slave 1: A Yaoi Visual Novel

name: Vampire Slave Art Book
short_description: Y Press Games art books are more than just all the beautiful art from the game. Creator Yaoimila takes readers down the Vampire Slave rabbit hole, sharing loads of insider details and tips to make your own successful visual novel!
